content: this legal case involves two parties the county court varaždin and the municipal court split the county court varaždin is the second instance court while the municipal court split is the first instance court the case number for the county court varaždin is gž74418 and for the municipal court split is r198316 the second instance court decision was made on 14042018 and the first instance court decision was made on 12042018 the procedure in this case is a cost procedure the court resolved a property dispute through a civil division process the court determined that the property a threebedroom apartment could not be divided due to its unique construction therefore the court ordered the property to be sold at a public auction and the proceeds were divided among the coowners the court based its decision on the property act and the findings of a construction expert the entire procedure lasted for approximately 4 years and 5 months
